ValidationRule.description: Partner_Relationship_for_OEM__c doesnot allows GC to select the new values
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(OR(Name = 'CHINA', Name = 'TAIWAN', Name = 'HONG KONG'), (OR(INCLUDES(Partner_Relationship_for_OEM__c,'Titanium Black'), INCLUDES(Partner_Relationship_for_OEM__c,'Titanium'), INCLUDES(Partner_Relationship_for_OEM__c,'Platinum'), INCLUDES(Partner_Relationship_for_OEM__c,'Gold'), INCLUDES(Partner_Relationship_for_OEM__c,'Authorized Reseller'), INCLUDES(Partner_Relationship_for_OEM__c,'Federal Registered'), INCLUDES(Partner_Relationship_for_OEM__c,'Federal Certified'), INCLUDES(Partner_Relationship_for_OEM__c,'Federal GSA Authorized'), INCLUDES(Partner_Relationship_for_OEM__c,'Federal System Integrator'), INCLUDES(Partner_Relationship_for_OEM__c,'Client products'), INCLUDES(Partner_Relationship_for_OEM__c,'Client Servers and Networking'), INCLUDES(Partner_Relationship_for_OEM__c,'Servers Storage and Networking'), INCLUDES(Partner_Relationship_for_OEM__c,'Client Servers Storage and Networking'), INCLUDES(Partner_Relationship_for_OEM__c,'All') )))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please select a relevant value for your country.
